scripts.postinstall: npm run build:icons && npm run msw:init
scripts.db:fresh: php artisan migrate:fresh --seed --force && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear
scripts.db:fresh:test: php artisan migrate:fresh --seed --force --env=testing && php artisan cache:clear --env=testing && php artisan config:clear --env=testing && php artisan route:clear --env=testing && php artisan view:clear --env=testing
scripts.schema: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas && mysqldump --no-tablespaces -u$(php artisan tinker --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.username");') -p$(php artisan tinker --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.password");') $(php artisan tinker --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.database");') > docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_full_dump.sql && cp docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_full_dump.sql docs/database/schemas/current_schema.sql
scripts.schema:test: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas && mysqldump --no-tablespaces -u$(php artisan tinker --env=testing --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.username");') -p$(php artisan tinker --env=testing --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.password");') $(php artisan tinker --env=testing --execute='echo config("database.connections.mysql.database");') > docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_test_full_dump.sql && cp docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_test_full_dump.sql docs/database/schemas/current_test_schema.sql
scripts.schema:csv: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv && php scripts/export_tables.php docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv && echo 'Table,Records' > docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv/table_summary.csv && for f in docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv/*.csv; do echo "$(basename "$f" .csv),$(wc -l < "$f" | awk '{print $1-1}')" >> docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv/table_summary.csv; done && cp -r docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_csv docs/database/schemas/current_tables_csv
scripts.schema:csv:test: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv && php --env=testing scripts/export_tables.php docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv && echo 'Table,Records' > docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv/table_summary.csv && for f in docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv/*.csv; do echo "$(basename "$f" .csv),$(wc -l < "$f" | awk '{print $1-1}')" >> docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv/table_summary.csv; done && cp -r docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_test_csv docs/database/schemas/current_test_tables_csv
scripts.schema:text: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas && php scripts/export_tables_text.php docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_tables.txt && cp docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_tables.txt docs/database/schemas/current_tables.txt
scripts.schema:text:test: mkdir -p docs/database/schemas && php scripts/export_tables_text.php --env=testing docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_test_tables.txt && cp docs/database/schemas/$(date +%d%b%Y)_Wrioter_test_tables.txt docs/database/schemas/current_test_tables.txt
